intro: Edrastenia, commonly known as the false lily of the valley, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asparagaceae. It consists of several species, most of which are native to South Africa. Edrastenia species are generally hardy and adaptable, thriving in a variety of soil types and light conditions.
